about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Highlights of what I do (and love):
about.text: I build production-grade WordPress sites and modern React web apps with a focus on speed, reliability, and maintainability. I’ve led projects that aggregate data across multiple properties (dashboards, reporting, and internal tools), automate content operations (WP-CLI, custom scripts, Jenkins/GitHub Actions), and improve developer workflows end-to-end.

portfolio.subtitle: Latest Work
portfolio.title: Explore My Projects
portfolio.work.title: Description

portfolio.works.title: Cleanmax Website
portfolio.works.content: The goal was to build a modern, high-performance website aligned with Cleanmax’s brand identity. Developed in WordPress using ACF for full content flexibility and styled with Bootstrap to match corporate colors and typography. Images and assets were optimized to achieve excellent scores on Google PageSpeed Insights. The result is a professional, fast, and fully responsive website that reflects Cleanmax’s values: maximum cleanliness and maximum efficiency.

portfolio.works.title: Personal Portfolio - Martin Vera
portfolio.works.goal: Showcase my work as a developer and offer a fast, minimal experience
portfolio.works.text: Personal portfolio built with React and Mantine, focused on performance, clean design, and maintainability.
portfolio.works.content: This site was created to centralize my projects and present my work as a web developer in a clear and professional way. Built with React and Mantine UI, it features a minimalist design, smooth animations, and a modular architecture that supports scalability. Vite is used as the bundler to achieve lightning-fast load times and great performance. It also includes multilingual support and Google Analytics integration to monitor user interaction. The result is a fast, modern, and functional site that reflects my development style: simple, efficient, and polished.
